item.description: Firefox setting Hamburger Icon Preferences General Network Settings Connection Settings (Settings) Enable DNS over HTTPS (Check Box) Use Provider: NextDNS Fly.io Per Application Basis https://fly.io/docs/app-guides/run-a-private-dns-over-https-service/
